Table.Name: ArchiveCurationHistory
Table.Description: Contains details of the matrix of the Archives' required curation tasks.

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: cuID
Column.Description: the unique curation task ID

Column.Name: logFile
Column.Description: filename of verbose logged task output

Column.Name: resultsFile
Column.Description: filename of any results file

Column.Name: timeStamp
Column.Description: Time of the completion of the whole task

Column.Name: curator
Column.Description: The archive curation scientist responsible for this event

Column.Name: comment
Column.Description: Comment string supplied by the curator

Column.Name: rolledBack
Column.Description: Flag for roll-back of this event: 0=no, 1 = yes

Table.Name: AstrCalVers
Table.Description: Contains a record for every astrometric calibration version in the archive.

Column.Name: versNum
Column.Description: Version number of current astrometric solution

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: startDate
Column.Description: MJD of the start time for this version of the calibration

Column.Name: endDate
Column.Description: MJD of the end time for this version of the calibration

Table.Name: CurationTask
Table.Description: Contains a list of all curation tasks that are used within the WSA.

Column.Name: cuID
Column.Description: the unique curation task ID

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: description in words for this task

Table.Name: CurrentAstrometry
Table.Description: Contains the current astrometric calibration coefficients.

Column.Name: multiframeID
Column.Description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

Column.Name: extNum
Column.Description: the extension number of this frame

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: distortMap
Column.Description: filename of 2d non-linear distortion map

Column.Name: centralRa
Column.Description: RA (J2000) at device centre

Column.Name: centralDec
Column.Description: Dec (J2000) at device centre

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates of device centre

Column.Name: posAngle
Column.Description: orientation of image x-axis to N-S

Column.Name: l
Column.Description: Galactic longitude of device centre

Column.Name: b
Column.Description: Galactic latitude of device centre

Column.Name: lambda
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 1 of device centre

Column.Name: eta
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 2 of device centre

Column.Name: imageExtent
Column.Description: The maximum angular extent from the central position

Column.Name: minRa
Column.Description: The minimum RA (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: minDec
Column.Description: The minimum Dec (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: maxRa
Column.Description: The maximum RA (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: maxDec
Column.Description: The maximum Dec (J2000) on the device

Column.Name: xPixSize
Column.Description: Angular size of pixels in X

Column.Name: yPixSize
Column.Description: Angular size of pixels in Y

Table.Name: ExternalSurvey
Table.Description: A list of all externally produced survey products held in the WSA.

Column.Name: surveyID
Column.Description: the unique identifier for the survey

Column.Name: surveyName
Column.Description: The short name of the survey, eg. SDSS-EDR, SDSS-DR1, USNOB etc.

Column.Name: databaseName
Column.Description: The name of the database within the WSA

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: A brief description of the survey

Column.Name: imagesLocation
Column.Description: Pathname to the pixels (eg. for list-driven remeasurement)

Table.Name: ExternalSurveyTable
Table.Description: Contains information about the external surveys tables.

Column.Name: surveyID
Column.Description: the unique identifier for the survey

Column.Name: extTableID
Column.Description: the unique table ID

Column.Name: extTableName
Column.Description: the name of the table

Column.Name: zone
Column.Description: default (0) or special (n) zone

Column.Name: sourceIDName
Column.Description: The source unique identifier in the table

Column.Name: coord1
Column.Description: The attribute name of the first (longitudinal) spherical co-ordinate, e.g. equatorial RA

Column.Name: coord2
Column.Description: The attribute name of the second (latitudinal) spherical co-ordinate, e.g. equatorial Dec

Table.Name: Filter
Table.Description: Contains details of the WFCAM filters.

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: UID of combined filter (assigned in WSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=K,6=H2,7=Br,8=blank)

Column.Name: shortName
Column.Description: Short identification name for the filter

Column.Name: name
Column.Description: The name of the filter, eg. "MKO J", "WFCAM Y" etc.

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: a concise description of the filter

Column.Name: cutOn
Column.Description: The 50% cut-on wavelength of the filter

Column.Name: cutOff
Column.Description: The 50% cut-off wavelength of the filter

Column.Name: aebv
Column.Description: The constant to multiply the Schlegel map E(B-V) by to get the total galactic extinction.

Column.Name: vegaToAB
Column.Description: The constant to convert Vega magnitudes to AB magnitudes.

Column.Name: oneSecMLVg
Column.Description: The Vega magnitude limit of a 1s exposure in this filter

Column.Name: isSectioned
Column.Description: Is the focal plane sectioned into different filters, 0 No, 1 Yes. If so, data for each section in FilterSections and SectionDetectors

Column.Name: filterType
Column.Description: The type of filter BROAD, NARROW, BROADLIST

Table.Name: Multiframe
Table.Description: Contains details of all multiframes stored in the archive.

Column.Name: multiframeID
Column.Description: UID of the multiframe (assigned sequentially by the archive ingest process)

Column.Name: ukirtRunNo
Column.Description: Original UKIRT run number (from filename)

Column.Name: frameType
Column.Description: The type of multiframe (eg. stack|tile|mosaic|difference|calibration|interleaved etc).

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: julianDayNum
Column.Description: the Julian Day number of the UKIRT night

Column.Name: fileTimeStamp
Column.Description: Time stamp digits (from the original CASU directory name and file time stamp) for enforcing uniqueness

Column.Name: numDetectors
Column.Description: The number of "detectors" (=image extensions in FITS file)

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: UID of combined filter (assigned in WSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=K,6=H2,7=Br,8=blank,9=1.205nbJ,10=1.619nbH,11=1.644FeII)

Column.Name: fileName
Column.Description: the filename for the multiframe, eg. server:/path/filename.fit

Column.Name: catName
Column.Description: the filename of the associated catalogue MEF, eg. server:/path/filename.fits

Column.Name: versionNum
Column.Description: a version number for this frame (if available)

Column.Name: frinID
Column.Description: UID of library calibration fringe frame

Column.Name: deprecated
Column.Description: Code for a current (=0) or deprecated (!=0) multiframe

Column.Name: newlyIngested
Column.Description: Curation flag for internal use only (0=no, 1=yes)

Column.Name: raMoon
Column.Description: Geocentric J2000 FK5 Mean Right ascension of the Moon

Column.Name: decMoon
Column.Description: Geocentric J2000 FK5 Mean Declination of the Moon

Column.Name: illumMoon
Column.Description: Illumination of the Moon

Column.Name: raMoonTopo
Column.Description: Apparent topocentric Right ascension of the Moon (including precession, nutation, and annual aberration)

Column.Name: decMoonTopo
Column.Description: Apparent topocentric Declination of the Moon (including precession, nutation, and annual aberration)

Column.Name: illumFile
Column.Description: File name of CASU created photometric illumination correction used on catalogue data from this file

Column.Name: unfilteredID
Column.Description: UID of original unfiltered frame corresponding to this filtered frame

Column.Name: mainImageID
Column.Description: UID of frame that this auxilliary image is related to

Table.Name: MultiframeDetector

Column.Description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

Column.Name: extNum

Column.Name: cuEventID

Column.Name: compFile

Column.Name: deprecated

Column.Name: totalExpTime

Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 1 of device centre

Table.Name: PreviousMFDZP
Table.Description: Contains previous zeropoints for each multiframe and detector combination.

Column.Name: multiframeID
Column.Description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

Column.Name: extNum
Column.Description: the extension number of this frame

Column.Name: versNum
Column.Description: the version number of the calibration

Column.Name: photZPCat
Column.Description: Photometric zeropoint for default extinction in catalogue header

Column.Name: photZPErrCat
Column.Description: Photometric zeropoint error in catalogue header

Column.Description: Number of standards used in determining photZP and photZPErr

Column.Name: nightZPCat
Column.Description: Average photometric zero point for night

Column.Name: nightZPErrCat

Column.Name: nightZPNum
Column.Description: Number of ZP in band used to calculate nightZPCat

Table.Name: Programme
Table.Description: Contains details of the WFCAM observation programmes.

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: UID of the archived programme coded as above

Column.Name: title
Column.Description: a short title for the programme, eg. "UKIDSS Large Area Survey"

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: a concise description of the programme

Column.Name: reference
Column.Description: a reference for the programme, eg. "http://www.ukidss.org/surveys/surveys.html"

Column.Name: propPeriod
Column.Description: the proprietory period for any data taken for this programme in months, e.g. 12 for open time.

Column.Name: dfsIDString
Column.Description: The description used within the data flow system (ie. the value of the appropriate FITS keyword)

Column.Name: catalogueSchema
Column.Description: Script file that describes the catalogue schema

Column.Name: detectionTable
Column.Description: Table name of detections

Column.Name: sourceTable
Column.Description: Table name of merged sources

Column.Name: listRemeasTable
Column.Description: [OBSOLETE] Table name of individual passband list re-measurements

Column.Name: sourceRemeasTable
Column.Description: [OBSOLETE] Table name of co-located list re-measurements

Column.Name: mergeLogTable
Column.Description: Table name of curation log for source merging

Column.Name: frameSetTolerance
Column.Description: The match tolerance for different passband frames

Column.Name: pairingCriterion
Column.Description: The pairing criterion for associating detections into merged sources

Column.Name: adjacentFrameTolerance
Column.Description: The match tolerance for adjacent frames in the survey

Column.Name: neighboursSchema
Column.Description: Script file that describes the neighbour tables schema for this programme

Column.Name: synopticSourceTable
Column.Description: Table name of merged variable sources

Column.Name: synopticBestMatchTable
Column.Description: Table name of merged variable sources

Column.Name: variabilityTable
Column.Description: Table name of merged variable sources

Column.Name: mosaicTool
Column.Description: Name of mosaicing tool to be used

Column.Name: extractTool
Column.Description: Name of extraction tool to be used

Column.Name: bandMergingCriterion
Column.Description: maximum timespan over which different filters are merged into sources in the synoptic source table.

Column.Name: isLowGalacticLat
Column.Description: Is this a low Galactic latitude field where Schlegel maps don't work (No=0/Yes=1)

Column.Name: sourceProdType
Column.Description: The product type to be used to create the source table. (stack, tile, mosaic)

Column.Name: epochFrameType
Column.Description: The frame type to be used for each epoch (stack, tile)

Column.Name: extinctionMapList
Column.Description: A list of 3D extinction maps that should be matched to this survey

Column.Name: epochTolerance
Column.Description: Minimum separation of epochs for proper motion calculation

Column.Name: synopticSetUp
Column.Description: A string describing the synoptic setup for more complicated surveys

Column.Name: doNotUseOBinfo
Column.Description: Don't use OB info in multi-epoch frame assignment.

Column.Name: mapRemeasTable
Column.Description: Table name of individual passband matched-aperture re-measurements

Table.Name: ProgrammeCurationHistory
Table.Description: Contains details of the matrix of programmes and required curation tasks.

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: the unique programme ID

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: timeStamp
Column.Description: Time of individual programme curation completion

Column.Name: status
Column.Description: successful (1) or unsuccessful (0)

Table.Name: ProgrammeFrame
Table.Description: Contains details of which image(s) belong to which Programme(s)

Column.Name: multiframeID
Column.Description: the UID of the relevant multiframe

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: ppErrBitsStatus
Column.Description: Bit flag to denote whether detection quality flagging has been done on this multiframe for this programme.

Column.Name: fieldID
Column.Description: UID of position on sky, set just after ProgrammeBuilder runs

Table.Name: ProgrammeTable
Table.Description: Contains details of the set of curated tables for each programme.

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: the unique programme ID

Column.Name: tableID
Column.Description: the unique table ID

Column.Name: tableName
Column.Description: the name of the table

Column.Name: sourceIDName
Column.Description: the name of the source

Table.Name: Provenance
Table.Description: Describes the provenance of all combined frames in the archive.

Column.Name: combiframeID
Column.Description: the UID of the combined frame (=combiframe)

Column.Name: multiframeID
Column.Description: the UID of the component frame

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Table.Name: Release
Table.Description: Contains the release details for a survey curated within the WSA.

Column.Name: surveyID
Column.Description: the unique identifier for the survey

Column.Name: releaseNum
Column.Description: the release number

Column.Name: releaseDate
Column.Description: the release date

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: a brief description of the release

Column.Name: dbName
Column.Description: the name of the SQL Server database containing this release

Table.Name: RequiredDiffImage
Table.Description: Contains details of default difference image products curated in the archive.

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: the unique programme ID

Column.Name: productID
Column.Description: A unique identifier assigned to each required difference image product entry

Column.Name: filter1
Column.Description: UID of WFCAM narrow band (primary) filter

Column.Name: filter2
Column.Description: UID of WFCAM broad band (reference) filter to be subtracted

Column.Name: wcs
Column.Description: CASU difference image tool option to specify use of implicit WCS in the input files (y/n; recommended value=y)

Column.Name: method
Column.Description: CASU difference image tool option string specifying the method to employ (recommended value=adaptive/back/zerosky)

Table.Name: RequiredFilters
Table.Description: Contains required filters used for every programme held in the WSA.

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: the unique programme ID

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: UID of combined filter (assigned in WSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=K,6=H2,7=Br,8=blank)

Column.Name: nPass
Column.Description: the number of passes that will be made

Column.Name: isSynoptic
Column.Description: is the band observed multiple times for variability measurements (0 FALSE, 1 TRUE)

Column.Name: obReqs
Column.Description: For wide shallow surveys with small number of epochs, what MSB requirements for each epoch.

Column.Name: softenParam
Column.Description: the softening parameter used in the calculation of Luptitudes

Table.Name: RequiredMosaic
Table.Description: Contains details of default mosaic image products curated in the archive.

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: the unique programme ID

Column.Name: productID
Column.Description: A unique identifier assigned to each required mosaic product entry

Column.Name: name
Column.Description: Name of the mosaiced product

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: Description of the product

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: UID of combined filter (assigned in WSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=K,6=H2,7=Br,8=blank)

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Right Ascension of mosaic centre

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Declination of mosaic centre

Column.Name: raExtent
Column.Description: The angular extent in RA of the mosaic image

Column.Name: decExtent
Column.Description: The angular extent in Dec of the mosaic image

Column.Name: nustep
Column.Description: Amount of microstepping

Column.Name: pixelSize
Column.Description: The final pixel size of the mosaic

Column.Name: dualFilterID
Column.Description: SEX extraction tool option to run in dual image mode UID of dual image filter (assigned in WSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=K,6=H2,7=Br,8=blank)

Column.Name: fieldID
Column.Description: UID of position on sky.

Column.Name: posAngle
Column.Description: Orientation of image x-axis to N-S

Column.Name: setupID
Column.Description: UID of top level setup.

Table.Name: calVarFrameSetInfo
Table.Description: Contains fitting information for each frameSet.

Column.Name: frameSetID
Column.Description: frame set ID, unique over the whole WSA via programme ID prefix, assigned by merging procedure

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: motionModel
Column.Description: Motion model used to produce BestMatch table. Values: static;proper motion;proper motion and parallax.

Column.Name: zaStratAst
Column.Description: Strateva parameter, a, in fit to astrometric rms vs magnitude in Z band, see Sesar et al. 2007.

Column.Name: zbStratAst
Column.Description: Strateva parameter, b, in fit to astrometric rms vs magnitude in Z band, see Sesar et al. 2007.

Column.Name: zcStratAst
Column.Description: Strateva parameter, c, in fit to astrometric rms vs magnitude in Z band, see Sesar et al. 2007.

Column.Name: zchiSqAst
Column.Description: Goodness of fit of Strateva function to astrometric data in Z band

Column.Name: znDofAst
Column.Description: Number of degrees of freedom of astrometric fit in Z band.

Column.Name: zisDefAst
Column.Description: Use a default model for the astrometric noise in Z band.

Column.Name: zaStratPht
Column.Description: Strateva parameter, a, in fit to photometric rms vs magnitude in Z band, see Sesar et al. 2007.

Column.Name: zbStratPht

Table.Name: calVariability
Table.Description: Contains statistical analysis of CAL primary sources.

Column.Name: sourceID
Column.Description: UID (unique over entire WSA via programme ID prefix) of this merged detection as assigned by merge algorithm

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: frameSetID
Column.Description: frame set ID, unique over the whole WSA via programme ID prefix, assigned by merging procedure

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Mean Right Ascension

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Mean Declination

Column.Name: sigRa
Column.Description: Uncertainty in mean RA

Column.Name: sigDec
Column.Description: Uncertainty in mean Dec

Column.Name: expAstErr
Column.Description: Rms calculated from polynomial fit to minimum astrometric RMS as a function of magnitude

Column.Name: epoch
Column.Description: Epoch of measurement

Column.Name: muRa
Column.Description: Proper motion in RA

Column.Name: muDec
Column.Description: Proper motion in Dec

Column.Name: sigMuRa
Column.Description: Error on proper motion in RA

Column.Name: sigMuDec
Column.Description: Error on proper motion in Dec

Column.Name: parallax
Column.Description: Parallax of star

Column.Name: minPllx
Column.Description: Lower limit of 90% confidence interval for parallax measurement

Column.Name: maxPllx
Column.Description: Upper limit of 90% confidence interval for parallax measurement

Column.Name: chi2
Column.Description: Chi-squared value of astrometric solution

Column.Name: nFrames
Column.Description: Number of frames with good detections used to calculate astrometric fits

Column.Name: znGoodObs
Column.Description: Number of good detections in Z band

Column.Name: znFlaggedObs
Column.Description: Number of detections in Z band flagged as potentially spurious by calDetection.ppErrBits

Column.Name: znMissingObs
Column.Description: Number of Z band frames that this object should have been detected on and was not

Column.Name: zbestAper
Column.Description: Best aperture (1-6) for photometric statistics in the Z band

Column.Name: zminCadence
Column.Description: minimum gap between observations

Column.Name: zmedCadence
Column.Description: median gap between observations

Column.Name: zmaxCadence
Column.Description: maximum gap between observations

Column.Name: ztotalPeriod
Column.Description: total period of observations (last obs-first obs)

Column.Name: zmeanMag
Column.Description: Mean Z magnitude

Column.Name: zmedianMag
Column.Description: Median Z magnitude

Column.Name: zMagRms
Column.Description: rms of Z magnitude

Column.Name: zMagMAD
Column.Description: Median Absolute Deviation of Z magnitude

Column.Name: zskewness
Column.Description: Skewness in Z band (see Sesar et al. 2007)

Column.Name: zMinMag
Column.Description: Minimum magnitude in Z band, of good detections

Column.Name: zMaxMag
Column.Description: Maximum magnitude in Z band, of good detections

Column.Name: zNgt3sig
Column.Description: Number of good detections in Z-band that are more than 3 sigma deviations

Column.Name: zExpRms
Column.Description: Rms calculated from polynomial fit to modal RMS as a function of magnitude in Z band

Column.Name: zIntRms
Column.Description: Intrinsic rms in Z-band

Column.Name: zchiSqpd
Column.Description: Chi square (per degree of freedom) fit to data (mean and expected rms)

Column.Name: zndof
Column.Description: Number of degrees of freedom for chisquare

Column.Name: zprobVar
Column.Description: Probability of variable from chi-square (and other data)

Column.Name: zVarClass
Column.Description: Classification of variability in this band

Column.Description: Number of detections in Nbj band flagged as potentially spurious by calDetection.ppErrBits

Column.Name: nbjnMissingObs
Column.Description: Number of Nbj band frames that this object should have been detected on and was not

Column.Name: nbjbestAper
Column.Description: Best aperture (1-6) for photometric statistics in the Nbj band

Column.Name: nbjminCadence
Column.Description: minimum gap between observations

Column.Name: nbjmedCadence
Column.Description: median gap between observations

Column.Name: nbjmaxCadence
Column.Description: maximum gap between observations

Column.Name: nbjtotalPeriod
Column.Description: total period of observations (last obs-first obs)

Column.Name: nbjmeanMag
Column.Description: Mean Nbj magnitude

Column.Name: nbjmedianMag
Column.Description: Median Nbj magnitude

Column.Name: nbjMagRms
Column.Description: rms of Nbj magnitude

Column.Name: nbjMagMAD
Column.Description: Median Absolute Deviation of Nbj magnitude

Column.Name: nbjskewness
Column.Description: Skewness in Nbj band (see Sesar et al. 2007)

Column.Name: nbjMinMag
Column.Description: Minimum magnitude in Nbj band, of good detections

Column.Name: nbjMaxMag
Column.Description: Maximum magnitude in Nbj band, of good detections

Column.Name: nbjNgt3sig
Column.Description: Number of good detections in Nbj-band that are more than 3 sigma deviations

Column.Name: nbjExpRms
Column.Description: Rms calculated from polynomial fit to modal RMS as a function of magnitude in Nbj band

Column.Name: nbjIntRms
Column.Description: Intrinsic rms in Nbj-band

Column.Name: nbjchiSqpd
Column.Description: Chi square (per degree of freedom) fit to data (mean and expected rms)

Column.Name: nbjndof
Column.Description: Number of degrees of freedom for chisquare

Column.Name: nbjprobVar
Column.Description: Probability of variable from chi-square (and other data)

Column.Name: nbjVarClass
Column.Description: Classification of variability in this band

Column.Name: zyiWS
Column.Description: Welch-Stetson statistic between Z and Y. This assumes colour does not vary much and helps remove variation due to a few poor detections

Column.Name: yjiWS
Column.Description: Welch-Stetson statistic between Y and J. This assumes colour does not vary much and helps remove variation due to a few poor detections

Column.Name: jhiWS
Column.Description: Welch-Stetson statistic between J and H. This assumes colour does not vary much and helps remove variation due to a few poor detections

Column.Name: hkiWS
Column.Description: Welch-Stetson statistic between H and K. This assumes colour does not vary much and helps remove variation due to a few poor detections

Column.Name: variableClass
Column.Description: Classification of objects across all bands.

Table.Name: ukirtFSstars
Table.Description: Contains UKIRT Faint Standards observed for calibration observations.

Column.Name: objID
Column.Description: Faint standard unique identifier (FS number; see Hawarden et al. 2001, MN, 325, 563)

Column.Name: name
Column.Description: reference name of field

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Right Ascension of star at Equinox J2000.0

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Declination of star at Equinox J2000.0

Column.Name: pmRA
Column.Description: Proper motion in RA

Column.Name: pmDec
Column.Description: Proper motion in Dec

Column.Name: epoch
Column.Description: The epoch of columns ra and dec

Column.Description: B band total magnitude

Column.Name: vMag
Column.Description: V band total magnitude

Column.Name: iMag
Column.Description: I band total magnitude

Column.Name: jMag
Column.Description: J band total magnitude on the MKO(UFTI) system

Column.Name: jMagErr
Column.Description: J band magnitude error

Column.Name: hMag
Column.Description: H band total magnitude on the MKO(UFTI) system

Column.Name: hMagErr
Column.Description: H band magnitude error

Column.Name: kMag
Column.Description: K band total magnitude on the MKO(UFTI) system
